description_for_human: Luxury vacation villa rental in Anse Marcel, Saint Martin (French Caribbean). 4 bedrooms, heated pool, sea views.
description_for_model: Villa Lily Blue is a luxury vacation rental villa in Anse Marcel, Saint Martin (French Caribbean). It features 4 bedrooms with super king beds (2m wide), 5 bathrooms, a heated private pool (10x5m), panoramic sea views, outdoor kitchen, fitness room, and 100 Mbps WiFi. Capacity: 8 guests. Rates from 350 EUR/night. Fully renovated in 2024.
